snippet: The police have charged Mike Duffy, a suspended Conservative senator who was once a close ally of Prime Minister Stephen Harper, with 31 counts of fraud, breach of trust and bribery.
abstract: Suspended Canadian Senator Mike Duffy, accused of receiving about $83,000 for expenses from Prime Min Stephen Harper's former chief of staff, faces 31 counts of fraud, breach of trust and bribery.
lead_paragraph: The police have charged Mike Duffy, a suspended Conservative senator who was once a close ally of Prime Minister Stephen Harper, with 31 counts of fraud, breach of trust and bribery.
